en-US: The one-stop shop for iNKORE!'s legal terms and understanding our terms of services, key policies and compliance
zh-CN: 查看 iNKORE! 的法律条款和了解我们的服务条款、关键政策和合规性的一站式服务

en-US: We believe ethical practices and open communication are the foundation of every relationship. This hub centralizes our legal frameworks, policies, and acknowledgments - ensuring you have clear, accessible insights into how we operate, protect your rights, and uphold our responsibilities.
zh-CN: 我们相信道德实践和开放沟通是每一种关系的基础。这个中心集中了我们的法律框架、政策和承认，确保您清楚、易于访问地了解我们的运作方式、保护您的权利和履行我们的责任。
